title: how to implement round robin algorithm?
body:
Highest priority goes to the new arrival, and the second priority is considered through FIFO in the waiting queue.

Queue 
front    P1     P2     P3      P4
-----------------------------------
0  P1 | [3]    
1  P1 | [2] >>
2  P2 |  2     [4] >>             <- P2 arrives
3  P3 |  2      4     [2]         <- P3 arrives
4  P1 | [1] >>  4      2 
5  P2 |  1     [3] >>  2 
6  P3 |  1      3     [1]
7  P1 | [0] >>  3      1  
8  P4 |         3      1     [3]  <- P4 arrives. FIFO disrupted.
9  P2 |        [2] >>  1      3   <- FIFO regained.
10 P3 |         2     [0] >>  3 
11 P4 |         2            [2]
12 P2 |        [1] >>         2 
13 P4 |         1            [1]
14 P2 |        [0] >>         1 
15 P4 |                      [0]
